data.title: Best Chinese in the LHV
data.text: food is always fresh and tastes great and it's great that they have tostones that comes with a great garlic dipping sauce.

data.title: Waste of time
data.text:
A couple years ago this was the place to go, the buffet was great and we could always count on great take out, not any more.
We did the four entree family deal last week and I was so disappointed.  The food was gross, the sesame chicken was so incredibly hard I wasn't even sure it was chicken.  The fried rice was just yellow rice, nothing fried about it.  Don't waste your money

data.title: Very impressed with lunch buffet
data.text: Traveling through Allentown in August, visiting my old neighborhood, I decided it was time for a late lunch.  I wasn't expecting anything really great for only $5 or so , but I was in for a surprise.  This stop was the highlight of my day.  Every item I tried on the buffet was just excellent!  And I like to sample everything, in fact I think I got 3 different plates of food. I seldom write reviews, but this place deserves a thumbs up!  Thank-you, Great Wall for a fine meal.

data.title: perfect chinese buffet
data.text: nice choice, nice staff, nice services and reall great quality of food. Maybe not thet enormous wide choice of food but still you can't eat it all or even try it all, because there's so much to choose and eat that it's hard to get into the car afterwards :D

data.title: Ugh!
data.text: Place was so-so on cleanliness and the food at the buffet was terrible. The poster who said the sesame chicken was good, must have a sodium deficiency. It seemed like it was 1 part chicken to two parts salt. And it was the best thing I tried. We actually paid up and left well before finishing, and went next door to a major pizza chain. In short I would rather lick the back wall of a urinal than eat there again.

data.title: Good Combos and the Broccoli with garlic sauce isnt too spicy, which I like.
data.text: Good Combos and the Broccoli with garlic sauce isnt too spicy, which I like.

data.title: Good food, very reasonable prices
data.text: If you're looking for a good Chinese buffet at a reasonable price, this is the place for you.  It's not the best I've ever had, but it is pretty good and the peanut chicken is awesome!
